thread.title: Ivanka Trump Tweeting About Religious Tolerance Went About as Bad as Expected
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump Tweeting About Religious Tolerance Went About as Bad as Expected

author: Abby Heugel
title: Ivanka Trump Tweeting About Religious Tolerance Went About as Bad as Expected
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 130 Shares It appears that Twitter fails run in the Trump family, as Ivanka took to the social media platform Monday night to tweet out what might be the most ironic statement ever uttered. America is a nation built on the principle of religious tolerance. We must protect our houses of worship & religious centers. #JCC — Ivanka Trump (@IvankaTrump) February 20, 2017 
Her tweet was in response to bomb threats called in to at least ten different Jewish community centers on Monday, for the fourth time in five weeks, according to Forward . It was no doubt well-intentioned. Giphy 
But it should be noted that Steve Bannon, Donald Trump’s chief strategist, was the editor of Breitbart , an anti-Semitic publication, and that Ivanka Trump practices Orthodox Judaism. The irony wasn't lost on Twitter, whose basic message was, "Tell your dad." — Andi Zeisler (@andizeisler) February 21, 2017 @IvankaTrump What's your daddy doing about it? This is on his watch, it's his problem to solve. Tough talk but delivers nothing. Sad! — Kelley Jean (@Kelebration) February 21, 2017 22 Words Rocks ...AND GETS ALL UP IN YOUR FACEBOOK More posts in #Gallery
